info.title: Financial Management API
info.description: A comprehensive API for financial management including features such as digital wallet management, transaction tracking, expense analytics, wishlists, and user notifications. Supports multi-currency transactions, subscription tracking, and shared wallet access.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication endpoints for user sign-in and sign-up

tags.name: Transaction
tags.description: Financial transaction operations including creation, updates, and analytics

tags.name: Transaction.Category
tags.description: Categories for organizing and classifying transactions

tags.name: Wallet
tags.description: Digital wallet management including balance and transactions

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password authentication. Returns a JWT access token that can be used to authenticate future requests.
Authenticate existing user and return JWT token

password.description: User password - must be at least 8 characters

platform.description: The platform of the wallet(Required based on wallet type)

get.description: List all wallets for the current user
Get a wallet by its ID

put.description: Update a wallet by its ID

delete.description: Delete a wallet by its ID

get.description: List all transactions for a wallet by its ID

post.description: Create a new wallet accessor for a wallet

delete.description: Delete a wallet accessor by its ID

put.description: Update a wallet accessor by its ID

bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer <token>
